headline: Kindness in Action, Change in Motion
tagline: We empower communities with education, clean water, and economic opportunity — one initiative at a time.
about: We are a youth-powered non-profit uplifting underserved communities in India through practical impact programs — from education to healthcare, water access, and women-led entrepreneurship.

charityMission.mission: To spark long-term change by investing in grassroots solutions driven by local communities.
charityMission.vision: A future where every village is self-sustaining, every child is educated, and every dream has a path forward.
charityMission.foundingStory: It started with 3 friends and one handpump in rural Gujarat. That handpump turned into a school, a microloan project, and a movement that now spans across 4 states — impacting thousands and growing stronger every year.
